mapper.sql: select no, subject, memberID, name, content, ref, re_step, type, TO_CHAR(regdate) as regdate from board
mapper.select: ORDER BY ref DESC, re_step ASC
WHERE name like #{searchKeyword} ORDER BY ref DESC, re_step ASC
WHERE subject like #{searchKeyword} ORDER BY ref DESC, re_step ASC
mapper.insert: insert into board (no, subject, memberID, name, content, type, re_step, regdate, ref) VALUES (BOARD_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{content}, 0, 0, sysdate, BOARD_NO_SEQ.currval)

insert into board (no, subject, memberID, name, content, ref, re_step, regdate, type) VALUES (BOARD_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{memberID}, #{memberName}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{re_step}, sysdate, #{type})
mapper.update: update board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
update board set type = #{type} where ref = #{ref}
